course.subject: RMBI
course.name: Business Intelligence Strategies and Applications
course.description: This course helps students to understand how to explore and use business intelligence systems to offer support in organizational knowledge and to improve its competitive advantages in respect to the use of business intelligent tools to business reporting, automation and alert, and intelligence creation. It focuses on the principles and methods of formulating business intelligence strategies, techniques and tools. It also stresses on the management skills of the business intelligence projects.
